nodes.text: Ken Liu (刘宇昆) is the author of "The Sith of Datawork," a short story which appears in the anthology From a Certain Point of View, celebrating the 40th anniversary of Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope. He has also written the junior novel The Legends of Luke Skywalker, a collection of legends and tall tales about the titular character debating whether or not he is a myth (in-universe).
